Q.3. X is Ys brother, Y is Zs wife, Z is Ws son, W is Vs wife. What is the relation of V with Y ?

(B) E is a brother of B

Q.11. A woman introduced a boy & said: His uncle (mama) & my uncle(mama) are brother of each other. What is the relation of the woman with that boy?
Q.12. Vinod pointed Archana & told: Her father is a son of my mothers sister. What is the relation of Archana with Vinod?
Q.13. C is nephew of As father. D is As cousin, but not Cs brother. How D is related to C?

Q.15. Juhi pointed Sanjay & said: He is the husband of the only sister of my fathers wifes son. How Juhi is related to Sanjay?

Q.17. My mother showed me a photograph & said: This beautiful ladys husband is a son of your mother. If I have not any brother, then what is my relation with the lady in photograph?
